persona.name: Elliot
persona.bio: Elliot, a 29-year-old full-time crypto trader, is known for his big-picture approach and willingness to take calculated risks. With intermediate experience in the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, he thrives on identifying emerging market trends and making bold moves that others might shy away from. Elliot's knack for seeing the potential in volatile markets has positioned him as a dynamic force in the trading community.
